verbose_text: In this study, ZsGreen labeled hADSCs survived in the salivary glands of rats at 24 weeks post-irradiation, and a small proportion was observed as positive for the expression of NKCC-1, CK7 and CK14, which indicated transdifferentiation into acinar and ductal cells.
evidence: expression of NKCC-1, CK7 and CK14
